title: Maokai: The Broken Champion
body:
I am writing this as a player.  As a previous Maokai player I am writing this from a place of wanting to see a change.  He is not what he used to be.  He is no longer a JG.  Or a viable pick.  When the changes were made to Maokai they ruined his gameplay.  Just the other day I was actually able to out run my own ult and watch the enemy team just slightly move to the side to let it pass by.  His old ult gave him utility and his new ult gives nothing to himself and to the team he is part of.  Granted this is my own opinion on the matter however I will say that I ended up not playing League for almost a year after these changes went through.  My main champion was Maokai and I jungled with him.  His kit was build for a bruser jungler build that was just massive tank with massive damage.  Some saw this as broken but in reality there are many champions when fed and built correctly do become very broken.  It boils down to build, skill and what happens in the game.

So here are some stats (op.gg is source)
1.89% pick rate in Ranked Gameplay across ALL ranks
~50% Win ratio in Ranked Gameplay across ALL ranks
0.16% Ban Rate across ALL ranks

So with a 1.89% pick rate he is not being played very much.  Granted there is a 50% win ratio.  Maokai is @ slot #137 for picked champion in ranked.  I am asking that Maokai be looked at again for another rework.

Personally I would love to have his old "R" back and also his passive.  But that is all I would want to have looked at.  Don't get me wrong having a timer on his passive is a good thing and honestly I would have no problem keeping his current passive.  But his ultimate needs to be looked at.

It is my opinion that Maokai is broken, not in a he's super powerful way, but in a way that his changes made him unappealing and actually hurt his gameplay and his core as a champion.  It hurt his jungling and utility.

If he could be looked at for a change that would be awesome.  But again this is just my opinion.  If you agree or disagree it's your choice.  And honestly I would love to hear different opinions on this!  But from the perspective of an ex Maokai main the changes hurt the champion and the champion's identity.

-Mal

TLDR: Maokai's rework and changing of his Ult destroyed him as a champion.  i would like to see a rework or revert to his old ult before the roots.  Opinions welcome and will be heard/replied to without  flaming.

Now his utility as a tank has been greatly diminished IMOP.  I think
I feel like if I play anything other than Trundle, I cannot do anything to Maokai. He's a god tier pick on 3v3 right now.
Almost forgot 3v3 existed.  I only play Rift and ARAM.  Don't really care for the 3v3 format personally.  But that is interesting to know he's good on 3v3.
It's all I play now, when I play. If Ascension was around I would probably play more often.

Previous maokai was a mix between a tank and a bruiser; He had an ult that screamed ' im a tank ' but a kit that screamed ' im a bruiser '. 
The current maokai is a solid bruiser, with a kit that screams "IM A BRUISER". 

That being said.... 
Saplings need to deal 80/120/140/180/220+0.4AP + 20/25/30/35/40% slow in an area around them on impact. 
Maokais saplings are honestly the least fun part of his kit because they have no actual value outside of position punishing, and even then they can be easily outplayed by just walking away.
Another helpful thing would probably be to just remove the arming time if you hit someone with the sapling. That would also really help.

I personally feel that removing the "I'm a tank" aspect of him removed a great deal of who he is.  And the saplings are GREAT for jungling.  But with his "I'm a bruiser" in his current setup jungling is not as effective IMOP.  But it destroyed what made him great in my eyes.  Not everyone is going to agree like I said but that's why I made the post.  Was wondering what those who play him think.

Really?  I have to 100% disagree with that statement.  Tank junglers are actually very strong if you know what you are doing and have somewhat decent lanes that don't fall on their face in the first 7-10 minutes.  Or scream relentlessly for ganks because they don't understand how a tank jungler works.  To many people rely on early ganks to win lanes.  Sometimes that doesn't happen.  And 90% of low ELO players won't try to invade or they will fail invade a tank jungler.  Amumu, Poppy, Naut and Sedj are all tank junglers.  You saying all those suck?  In my experience late game tank junglers have more influence over the outcome of the game if your lanes don't fall apart pre-10 minutes.

This has been my personal experience playing from the jungle.  So data set is limited.

My point about Maokai needing another look is he used to be a very strong jungler.  He is now nothing but a top lane figure head.  But this is all my personal opinion.  I play jungle, top, bot/support.  I have yet to see Maokai in ranked or on draft.  Why is this?  Why is his stats on op.gg say 100% top.  His jungle percentage is gone!
